bibl.title: Letter from Caroline Latimer to Howard A. Kelly, June 15, 1908

div1.p: Latimer writes about assistance for the Kissingers and possible strategy for applying to the Carnegie Fund.

div1.head: Letter from Caroline Latimer to Howard A. Kelly, June 15, 1908
div1.opener:
K
see if we can
1408 Park Ave.
June 15, 1908
Dear Dr. Kelly:
div1.p:
It has occurred
to me that perhaps
Kissinger could be help-
ed from the Carnagie
fund. If there is any
possibility of it, would
it not be well to
write to Mr. Gilman
or someone else and
find out? If there
is anything I can
Ac
Ki
do in the matter let
me know by note or
telephone and I will
come and see you
or do anything you
suggest. I am
much exercised in
my mind about him
and his wife.
